page.title: 16Industry in Horsmonden
page.content: In Horsmonden there are two factories. Boddington's, on the Goudhurst Road, is a plastics moulding firm which works 24 hours a day making such things as radio casings, torches, canoe paddles, etc. Heath Engineering in Maidstone Road was founded in 1919 & was housed in a building on the Green which is still used as a store. The present premises were opened in 1951. They sell & repair farm & garden machinery. Also in the village is the Apple Growers Association building, which is a cold store, & sorting & distribution centre for local fruit growers. Louis Reece is a similar concern in Maidstone Road which also deals with imported fruit. On the Goudhurst Road, East of the village, is Noakes' Cold Store which is used by international firms to store their food products before distribution
